page.title: 04Richmond Swimming Pool
page.content: Richmond Baths are at the bottom of Station Bank.There are two pools,a deep one,25 metres long for swimmers and a shallow one for learners and young children.There are changing rooms and a cafe where you can buy refreshments and watch people swimming from the balcony.There are no diving boards but I think divers should use a diving pool. I go swimming once or twice a week;and with school fortnightly.I go once a week to a swimming club to perfect my swimming.I am in the top group.Sometimes I go with my parents or to the Fun Hour.Then there are all sorts of things to play with such as a giant inflateable octopus,rings and a huge ball.When I go with my parents we finish off by going to the cafe for refreshments and to watch other people swim. Joanne Hill.
